column5: I've been reeeeeeeeely behind in any reports, or fishing pics this season it seems outside of my annual spring Algonquin report...but its not with out good reason. Its because I have not been fishing of course... Why you ask?  Well that’s simple... My Wife was due with our 3rd child, so travel since June was officially Banned by house rule(AKA..the warden)  So it finally happened yesterday at 4:30pm Along came My first Son J.J.(Jack, Jeffrey) weighing in at a hefty 8lb 1oz 20" long, and full of piss and vinegar!!! Literally... He came into the world screaming, and pissing all over the doctor and nurses LOL!!!!  So anyway, The family is Happy and healthy now, but boy oh boy let me tell you the Wife had it rough this time around...au natural thanks to some "missed details" Regardless, She's one tough cookie, and I thought I'd share it cause she deserves the accolades  So as for my poor fishing performance this year, and lack of reports I'll be producing.... I just became the Proud father of 3 children under the age of 4 which of course means I'll be a bit busy. That’s my excuse, and I'm sticking to it!  But for the record I wouldn't have it any other way Cheers,  For those Baby folk, who just love babys...here's a small video He's pretty alert for being about 2.5 hours old!  http://s31.photobucket.com/albums/c363/coo...nt=100_8000.flv
Awesome! I was waiting to see him!   G
Congratulations, you have good reason to rest the water for a while.
That's GREAT!!  Congrqtulations!!!  He sure is a big boy though....cudo's to the Mrs  Maureen
Congrats to you and your wife beautiful looking boy  Rob
Looking good cookslav.  Congratulations.  Great to see everyone doing so well.
Congrat's to you and your wife!
Congrats Cookslav.  Although you won't have as much time to spend on the water in the near future, that gives you a perfect reason to get a bigger boat !
I Like that! I'll bring that one to the wardens attention...in a few weeks LOL

Now that's a good excuse for not fishing!  Problem is, that isn't likely going to change too much in the near future!!!  Congrats....he's looking like a champ already...a prime candidate for a lifetime fishing partner!  Glad to hear everyone is happy and healthy....
Awesome! Congrats with the new addition to the family. Hope mom and new son are doing well! What a way to announce your presence with authority, peeing all over the Doc's and nurses!!!  Cheers, 1leg
Congratulations! Your excuse is accepted! Family first, fishing second!
Congrats to you and the 'Warden'.    I think JJ will fill your days...looks like he already has something to say...all the best.
.....Congrats to you and your wife. Sounds exactly how it went for me, number three was my son, finally. When he was born my daughters were 1 and 2 years old.  You and your wife are gonna be busy.

sweet!!! that's awesome dude...congrats for sure!  Look at the hair on that boy......and nice story lol  We're "workin" on our second one right now....  Heath and happiness to you and the family!  Cheers, UF
